channel.title: Industry on bcdata
channel.description: Recent content in Industry on bcdata

item.title: Career Panel: Mathematicians in Industry
item.description: Career panel at Mobify Summary On the evening of August 16th, BC Data Science workshop participants gathered at Mobify headquarters for a career panel and social event. The panel discussed non-academic career options for mathematicians; how mathematicians should prepare for industry jobs and job interviews; and what differences to expect in industry. More broadly, the panelists discussed career success, personal values, and strategies for achieving career-oriented goals.
